languages.text: Смиренно внял Орден Молота словам наперсника Бога-Императора, и разблокировалися гермозатворы, и отворилися врата обители, и вынесли из них праведные блага для страждущих.

Humbly the Order of the Hammer heeded the God-Emperor's confidant, and unsealed the airlocks, and opened the gate of its abode, and brought forth gifts of virtue to relieve the suffering of the ill-stricken.
languages.original_text: Смиренно внял Орден Молота словам наперсника Бога-Императора, и разблокировалися гермозатворы, и отворилися врата обители, и вынесли из них праведные блага для страждущих.

Humbly the Order of the Hammer heeded the God-Emperor's confidant, and unsealed the airlocks, and opened the gate of its abode, and brought forth gifts of virtue to relieve the suffering of the ill-stricken.

languages.text: La Orden del Martillo acató humildemente la decisión de{mf|l| la} representante del Dios Emperador. Sus integrantes abrieron las esclusas y las puertas de su morada, y trajeron regalos para aliviar el sufrimiento de los desdichados.
languages.original_text: Humbly the Order of the Hammer heeded the God-Emperor's confidant, and unsealed the airlocks, and opened the gate of its abode, and brought forth gifts of virtue to relieve the suffering of the ill-stricken.

traits.locale_text: La Orden del Martillo acató humildemente la decisión de{mf|l| la} representante del Dios Emperador. Sus integrantes abrieron las esclusas y las puertas de su morada, y trajeron regalos para aliviar el sufrimiento de los desdichados.

languages.text: 重锤修会谦卑地遵从着神皇使者的嘱托，解开了气闸，打开了修道院的大门，并带来了受祝福的礼物，减轻那些病患们的痛苦。
languages.original_text: Humbly the Order of the Hammer heeded the God-Emperor's confidant, and unsealed the airlocks, and opened the gate of its abode, and brought forth gifts of virtue to relieve the suffering of the ill-stricken.

traits.locale_text: 圣锤修会谦卑地遵从着神皇使者的嘱托，解开了气闸，打开了修道院的大门，并带来了受祝福的礼物，减轻那些病患们的痛苦。

languages.text: 鉄槌の修道会は慎ましやかに神帝陛下の忠臣の言葉を聞き入れ、エアロックを開いて建物への門を開き、美徳の贈り物を持ってきて、病に苦しむ人々の痛みを和らげた。
languages.original_text: Humbly the Order of the Hammer heeded the God-Emperor's confidant, and unsealed the airlocks, and opened the gate of its abode, and brought forth gifts of virtue to relieve the suffering of the ill-stricken.

traits.locale_text: 鉄槌の修道会は慎ましやかに神帝陛下の忠臣の言葉を聞き入れ、エアロックを開いて建物への門を開き、美徳の贈り物を持ってきて、病に苦しむ人々の痛みを和らげた。

languages.text: Demütig folgte der Orden des Hammers {mf|dem|der} Vertrauten des Gottimperators, öffnete die Luftschleusen und das Tor und überbrachte tugendhafte Geschenke, um das Leid der Unglücklichen zu lindern.
languages.original_text: Humbly the Order of the Hammer heeded the God-Emperor's confidant, and unsealed the airlocks, and opened the gate of its abode, and brought forth gifts of virtue to relieve the suffering of the ill-stricken.

traits.locale_text: Demütig folgte der Orden des Hammers {mf|dem|der} Vertrauten des Gottimperators, öffnete die Luftschleusen und das Tor und überbrachte tugendhafte Geschenke, um das Leid der Unglücklichen zu lindern.

languages.text: Humblement, l'Ordre du Marteau se plie à la volonté {mf|du confident|de la confidente} de l'Empereur-Dieu et ouvre les portes de son domaine pour soulager par le don de la vertu les souffrances des malheureux.
languages.original_text: Humbly the Order of the Hammer heeded the God-Emperor's confidant, and unsealed the airlocks, and opened the gate of its abode, and brought forth gifts of virtue to relieve the suffering of the ill-stricken.

traits.locale_text: Humblement, l'Ordre du Marteau se plie à la volonté {mf|du confident|de la confidente} de l'Empereur-Dieu et ouvre les portes de son domaine pour soulager par le don de la vertu les souffrances des malheureux.

languages.text: Çekiç Tarikatı alçak gönüllülükle Tanrı İmparator'un sırdaşının sözlerine uyup hava kilitlerini faal hâle getirdi, kapıları açtı ve hastalığa yakalanmışlara, onları acılarından azat etme armağanını bahşetti.
languages.original_text: Humbly the Order of the Hammer heeded the God-Emperor's confidant, and unsealed the airlocks, and opened the gate of its abode, and brought forth gifts of virtue to relieve the suffering of the ill-stricken.

traits.locale_text: Çekiç Tarikatı alçak gönüllülükle Tanrı İmparator'un sırdaşının sözlerine uyup hava kilitlerini faal hâle getirdi, kapıları açtı ve hastalığa yakalanmışlara, onları acılarından azat etme armağanını bahşetti.
